readable.title: 2522540026_6ee8ab4c6a
readable.content: A race car moves down the road as two people watch from a distance . A race car , numbered 104 is rounding a bend as two people watch and take pictures . A silver and blue rally car is passing two spectators who are standing at the roadside . Blue and silver car going around curve being watched by people standing in grass Silver and blue car marked 104 raises dust on road as two background people watch .
